item.title: Installing QMK on Keychron k3v2 RGB with optical switches
item.description: Disclaimer: Bluetooth connectivity will not work after this modification On my system, when you first plug the usb cable, it almost never connects at the first time. I added EEPROM_RESET keybinding on Fn+Space button. It does connect after I press Fn+Space now. How to do it: Using this guide; https://sonixqmk.github.io//SonixDocs/install/ Setup QMK environment with Sonix QMK repo Apply config and keymap files Download “Sonix Keyboard Flasher” Compile QMK Sonix fimware with this command -> qmk compile -kb keychron/k3/rgb/optical_iso -km iso Binary is at your home “qmk_firmware” folder and named with “.
